title: Is We Dumb? | Fire Hydrant. Doorstop. Condom. Space Worm.
description:
We've all arranged furniture in weird sex positions, took photos of said positions, uploaded them to our website, and then wrote dirty captions about what's happening, right?  Probably not. Let's talk about that, thinking erections are pee filled dongs, getting disqualified from a school talent show, maybe the greatest theme song in history, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/ZGeOODJWgmE
